tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I had a bad case of neglected tooth decay for the past TEN years. Miraculously, it never got infected until now. All my previous dental experiences from my childhood to a horrendous one two years ago, were seriously bad. Then I walked into Doctor's Poorvi's clinic with a good amount of skepticism and fear. What happened next, almost changed my life. First, I got a very astute explanation of why my dental experiences were bad till now. I got a good idea of how my teeth issues can be dealt with. And, then subsequently the treatment of that dreaded root canal began. I was a bit of a cry baby, but props to the doc who treated me with stoic patience, made the procedure as painless as possible, for a decay case as horrible as mine. 
Now, finally, a dentist doesn't sound like a scary person you don't want to visit. In fact I am looking forward to getting every tooth issue fixed in the coming time. 
So, Thank you doc!
reply_text: Thank you so much sumit for your kind feedback

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
From a standard check up to a cavity filling, Dr. Poorvi takes immense care to ensure a through job is done. Doctor, clinic and her assistant are extremely hygienic and once you enter the clinic itself, you know you'll be well cared for. Dr. Poorvi respects her patients time. shes always on time and gives a head's up in advance in case an appointment is running late, to save you time. 
Doctor is courteous during cavity extractions and even a simple check. she puts your nervousness to rest with her gentle manner. she also takes time to explain the dental situation and treatment until the patient is satisfied.
On cost front, quite reasonable given the hygiene and good equipment she uses.
reply_text: Thank you Vanessa for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Treatment for bleeding/ Swolen Gums,Broken Teeth,
review:
I was having problems with three of my teeth when I visited Dr Poorvi I was little anxious and worried as I was not going to my regular dentist and the covid fear was also there 

She was so patient and nice that my anxiety was over only by talking to her 
At her clinic all the covid protocols are followed perfectly ,For my age and since I am co morbid she made sure that she called me always as a first patient 

As for my treatment she gave me all the right advise and never tried to misguide me ,even the other visiting doctors are very gentle and well versed
I am so glad that I found her she solved everything properly ,she is very will versed with her profession ,she  doesn't over charge ,she also gave me all the advise to avoid further complications and assured me that she is always available on phone call if I need her 

Very gentle *** **** **** ****** also 

Her assistant also is polite and helpful 

I would suggest her to everyone I know
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
I visited Dr. Poorvi for second time for tooth related ailment. My experience with her has been very good both times. I visited her for a cavity filling a couple of years back and for RCT recently. She knows her craft. She is so good that treatment like RCT was not painful at all. She provides realistic options as well as advice. I was quite scared to visit a clinic due to ongoing pandemic, however, enough precautions are being taken at the clinic to ensure that infection is not spread. 
Would highly recommend her !!
reply_text: thank you for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
In the time of a pandemic when most of the doctors in my area were unavailable I contacted Dr. Poorvi who consulted me on the phone before giving me an appt to visit her clinic. We were thoroughly sanitised and temperature checked in the premises before the visit.
Dr. Poorvi, very patiently heard me out and spelt out the possible causes and diagnosis and the treatment. She was very friendly and patient during the whole consultation. 
Even after the visit she has made herself available on phone for further doubts and questions and even proactively follows up with me for updates on improvement. 
I am glad I chose to get myself checked up by Ms. Poorvi. A very professional and sincere doctor whom I wouldn't hesitate to refer and recommend to a friend.
reply_text: Thank you Aishwarya for your kind words üôèüèª

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I have seen probabaly 15 different dentists in my life as a patient and I personally know 700+ dentists in professional environment in Australia because I work very closely with this industry in marketing capacity.

I must say Dr Poorvi has exceeded my expectations beyond anything I expected.

The best thing about her is that she thinks of patient‚Äôs case as if it was her own or of the closest family‚Äôs

Her treatment suggestions are based on the best thing to do by the patient rather than the most profitable thing for herself, unlike some dentists. 

I strongly recommend her for any dental treatment as she has a lot of experience. Also the materials she uses are of a very high standard. 

A BIG THANKs to Dr Poorvi and her team!!! You guys are amazing and if I ever have any dental issues I would prefer flying from Australia and seeing you rather than getting my dental work done in australia.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Quite impressive,I would say,I reached the 5 mins early to my appointment time.Good set up,as technician jotted down few details and just within few minutes I was called in..I was very pleased to see the hygine and the set up of chairs,very neat and professional.
Dr.Poorvi herself came and enquire about history and treatments required to be done,while giving me all the options.I thought she explained to me in a very simple language describing the various aspects of couple of problems I was having.Treatment lasted for 40/45 mins..I think I never felt any pain,Nausea,Numbness......I was fearing the most,as my previous experience with my neighbouring Dentist was horrifying...
In fact here I felt completely released and relieved after the treatment ,with prescription of couple of medicines and with one more appointment my treatment would be done...I thought it is quick as I was prescribed 4/5 sittings.
I can surely recommend Dr Poorvi to my neighbours,who perhaps do not know of such a nice and modern clinic set up not very far away from house at Juhu.
I want to specially complement young Dr Poorvi and wish her all the best in her career!!

tags: None
review:
Basically I was suffering from  my tooth issue since a fortnight,My old doctor is out of town and I was referred to This doctor(her name Dr.Poorvi)by my cousin,since Her clinic is located right near my house near D.N.Nagar,Andheri.I was given the appointment and I was amazed to see the clinic set up..It's one of the most modern clinic I thought.. and far superior to my regular dentist's clinical set-up.There was no waiting  as Doctor immediately called me inside,After occupying the chair,She asked few basic question about the pain and the last treatment etc..etc..And I could never realise when the treatment began and when it got over!!I thought it was pretty personalized treatment  and the ease &comfort with this Doctor started treatment,I was really pleasantly surprised,as Invariably my  experience with the dentist  is HORRIBLE!! Anyway,She used one laser instrument,while I was curious to understand the mechanics and the advantages of the same,Without the slightest hesitation, she explained the purpose of some of the most modern instrument...I would rank my experience as Marvelous!!With the young mind working so proficiently...It was superb.I have taken another appointment on 9th Dec.
EXCELLENT!!

tags: None
review:
I had black gums which ruined my confidence to smile. I went to many dentists and everyone suggested scary surgeries. That's why I kept ignoring the issue. After hearing abt dr. Poorvi's painless laser dentistry I gathered the courage to see her. She assured me that I wouldn't even require an injection. That was it. I decided to go ahead n here I am I love  my smile 
The procedure was painless. She made minor corrections in my teeth too and bleached them. Never  knew I could have a such an amazing smile. 
Dr. Poorvi and her work is second to none. I am her permanent patient.

that too in one sitting .
